createChannelDescription: Channels are where your team communicates. They're best when organized around a topic â€” #project-mars, for example.
channelNameInvalid: Must start with a letter or number
channelNameHint: Can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
publicDescription: Anyone can view and join this channel
privateDescription: Only invited members can view this channel
allMembersInChannel: All members are already in the channel
deleteChannelWarning: After deleting the channel, all messages and files will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
leaveChannelWarning: You will no longer have access to this channel's messages and files.
noMessagesYet: No messages yet. Join the channel to start the conversation!
botStartupCountdownMessage: HI, Your OpenClaw Bot is starting up. Please wait for the countdown to finish before chatting.
botStartupSuccessMessage: HI, Your OpenClaw Bot has started successfully!
emptyPublicChannelDesc: This channel has an AI Bot ready to help. Type @ to mention the bot in your message and start a conversation.
botNotMemberPublicDesc: {{botName}} is not a member of this channel and won't receive your message. Would you like to add it to the channel first?
botNotMemberPrivateAdminDesc: {{botName}} is not a member of this private channel and won't receive your message. Would you like to add it to the channel first?
botNotMemberPrivateDesc: {{botName}} is not a member of this private channel and won't receive your message. Please contact a channel admin to add the bot.
botInstanceStoppedMessage: The bot's instance is currently stopped. Start it to resume chatting.
